longBusinessSummary: Nova Vision Acquisition Corporation does not have significant operations. The company intends to effect into a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, recapitalization, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses or entities. It focuses on sourcing opportunities that are in the proptech, fintech, consumertech, supply chain management industries, or technology companies that serve these or other sectors. The company was formerly known as Lighthouse Acquisition. Nova Vision Acquisition Corporation was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Singapore, Singapore.
